title: Security Quality Gateway
content: # Security Quality gateway Security Quality gateway is element which is meant to provide informations about actual state of Security of given scope. Gateway is returning information about Code, OpenSource and WebApp Vulnerabilities of given resources if any. Results of a gateway maybe configured in Administration panel. Algorithm to count the value is always the same but value when result is failing may be customized. ###Accessing Sequrity Quality gateway may be accessed via: * REST API - more details in swagger * Jenkins plugin which will be introduced later on
